EmailTemplate.name: 2018 Dealer Update #10A.2018 Dealer Update #10A
EmailTemplate.subject: Honeywell Sales Bulletin Updates
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]>
Sales Bulletin | June 2018
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​ for RM-855​ Equipped Aircraft​
- This sales bulletin provides updated pricing and product information for aircraft equipped with RM-855 radio suites. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-24 Rev B <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-24 Rev B Primus II ADS-B Out Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins.
ADS-B Out Upgrade Program​​ for RM-850​ Equipped Aircraft​
- This sales bulletin provides updated pricing and product information for aircraft equipped with RM-850 radio suites. - Here is Honeywell Sales Bulletin 2018-30 <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/2018-30 Primus II ADS-B Out Upgrade for Business Aircraft.pdf]]>. - Dealers can find 2018 sales bulletins in the Honeywell Aerospace Website or in MyAerospace <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/uNZ0000I0q0G0y02I00QXr0]]>/Parts & Repairs/Downloads/Sales Bulletins
Click here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/Subscription_Page.html]]> to sign up for Honeywell Aerospace email communications.
